text: This pet-sized Metroid-like can be finished in one sitting (my Steam shows 3 hours), and sometimes that's exactly what I need as a bridge between two big games. It has some surprisingly innovative gameplay moments thanks to the mechanic where you can switch between being a fast kitty or a powerful cat in a mech suit (doesn't that sound awesome?). The music and graphics are directly inspired by Metroid. For under 10$, this is a recommended breath of fresh air.
author: SupraDarky
